page.title: 13FACILITIES IN DRAYCOTT
page.content: {DRAYCOTT PARISH CHURCH}WAS DEDICATED TO ST. PETER IN 1861. RECENT REPLACEMENT OF PEWS BY CHAIRS MAKES THE BUILDING MULTI-PURPOSE FOR WORSHIP,MEETINGS, CONCERTS AND EXHIBITIONS. THE{RECREATION GROUND} PRESENTED TO THE VILLAGE CHILDREN BY A BENEFACTOR IN 1925 IS ALSO USED BY THE FOOTBALL CLUB. THE TWO {PUBLIC HOUSES} HAVE SKITTLE ALLEYS. THIS IS A POPULAR GAME THERE BEING SEVERAL LADIES TEAMS AS WELL AS MENS PLAYING IN A LOCAL LEAGUE. THE CHURCH ORGANISES A TOURNAMENT ANNUALLY MOST VILLAGE ORGANISATIONS FIELDING TEAMS. {TWO {GENERAL STORES}, ONE ALSO THE {POST {OFFICE,}A {HAIRDRESSING SALON, {SADDLERY SHOP}AND {WOODCARVERS}SERVE DRAYCOTT. NEWSPAPERS AND MILK ARE DELIVERED DAILY. THE MAIN POSTAL DELIVERY IS BY BICYCLE.
